attributes.action: Include all COVID19 deaths in the official figures so we have accurate data.
attributes.additional_details: It is important for UK and global citizens to have accurate data on important issues such as the rate and severity of diseases spreading in our communities. There is a feeling that we are currently being misled.
attributes.background: The British people wish for accurate statistics on the COVID19 fatalities.

rejection.details: Since you started this petition, the ONS has published statistics for all notified Coronavirus deaths, inlcluding outside of hospital settings.
